Title: Underground
Actors: Predrag 'Miki' Manojlovic, Lazar Ristovski, Mirjana Jokovic, Slavko Stimac
Plot: A group of Serbian socialists prepares for the war in a surreal underground filled by parties, tragedies, love and hate.
Country: Federal Republic of Yugoslavia, France, Germany, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Hungary, UK, USA
